SEARCH
Module fitnessclub.demoproj3
Package fitnessclubjavafx

Class StudioManagerController

java.lang.Object
fitnessclubjavafx.StudioManagerController
public class StudioManagerController extends Object
This is controller for the Studio Manager GUI. Allows for user inputs to manage the fitness club functionalities. Handles onClick functionalities for GUI Nodes/Buttons
Author:
Ved Patel, Vivek Manthri

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, sets up radio buttons / the TableView contents, and calls input restrict method at the start

    • onPrintByMemberButtonClick

      protected void onPrintByMemberButtonClick()
      Displays all the members in the list sorted by their profiles upon button click.

    • onPrintByCountyButtonClick

      protected void onPrintByCountyButtonClick()
      Displays all the members in the list sorted by county/zip code upon button click.

    • onPrintByFeeButtonClick

      protected void onPrintByFeeButtonClick()
      Displays all the members with their next bill due amounts upon button click.

    • onDisplayScheduleButtonClick

      protected void onDisplayScheduleButtonClick()
      Displays the class schedule with current attendees upon button click.

    • onAddMemberButtonClick

      protected void onAddMemberButtonClick()
      Allows for the addition of a member to the club upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before adding the member to the system.

    • onLoadClassesButtonClick

      protected void onLoadClassesButtonClick()
      Loads all the fitness classes from selected classSchedule.txt upon button click. Displays the schedule on the tableView. Sets the button to gray once the task is completed.

    • onLoadMembersButtonClick

      protected void onLoadMembersButtonClick()
      Loads all the members from selected memberList.txt upon button click. Sets the button to gray once the task is completed.

    • onAddMemberToClassButtonClick

      protected void onAddMemberToClassButtonClick()
      Allows for the addition of a member to a fitness class upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before adding the member to the class.

    • onAddGuestToClassButtonClick

      protected void onAddGuestToClassButtonClick()
      Allows for the addition of a guest to a fitness class upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before adding the guest to the class.

    • onRemoveMemberFromClassButtonClick

      protected void onRemoveMemberFromClassButtonClick()
      Allows for the removal of a member from a fitness class upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before removing the member from the class.

    • onRemoveGuestFromClassButtonClick

      protected void onRemoveGuestFromClassButtonClick()
      Allows for the removal of a guest from a fitness class upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before removing the guest from the class.

    • onCancelButtonClick

      protected void onCancelButtonClick()
      Allows for the cancellation of a member's membership upon button click. Ensures all necessary user inputs are inputted before removing the member from the system.
